verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Neriah <S%H5374><s%>, when he wrote <S%H3789><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto thee <S%H1263><s%>, O Baruch:

Thou didst say <S%H559><s%>, Woe <S%H188><s%> is me now <S%H3068><s%>! for Jehovah hath added <S%H3254><s%> sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to my pain <S%H4341><s%>; I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my groaning <S%H585><s%>, and I find <S%H4672><s%> no rest <S%H4496><s%>.

Thus shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H1129><s%>, that which I have built will I break down <S%H2040><s%>, and that which I have planted <S%H5193><s%> I will pluck up <S%H5428><s%>; and this in the whole land <S%H776><s%>.

And seekest <S%H1245><s%> thou great things <S%H1419><s%> for thyself <S%H1245><s%>? seek them not <S%H935><s%>; for, behold, I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> upon all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; but thy life <S%H5315><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> unto thee for a prey <S%H7998><s%> in all places <S%H4725><s%> whither thou goest <S%H3212><s%>.
